Introduction

Taeyoung is a South Korean singer under Starship Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group CRAVITY.

On January 22, 2020, Taeyoung was introduced as a trainee under Starship. Months later, on March 18, he was revealed to be a member of Starship's upcoming boy group CRAVITY. He officially debuted with them on April 14, with the release of the mini album 'Hideout: Remember Who We Are'.
